name: PoutineTime
description:
This is a two-player only game, player one moves using WASD, player two moves with the arrow keys. The goal is to make delicious poutines by laying down fries, cheese curds and gravy.

Player one can press SPACE to throw bacon, player two uses ENTER. Bacon stuns your opponent for a second, having food fall on the other player makes them lose two seconds. You have 30 seconds to get as many points as you can, may the best lumberjack chief win!
